column5: Well, we rolled into the park on Wednesday and set up camp. Weather was perfect!  We fished in and around the park for the 5 day duration. The bite was slow and tough....but we got some! Pics Below:  Still ice on the lakes!!!   Fishing a remote lake in my Zodiac -   A Few Specks from the lake:   We caught a total of 11 specks, Kept these six....and I "planked" em. So delicious!!   A few lunkers from inside the park:   The Stradic performed flawlessly:   Fished another lake outside the park and found this:   MMMM...another recipe. This was delicious...   An evening at the campsite   Ill probobly post this in another topic...but these signs were everywhere..and the C/O's were all over it..   Saw 14 moose!
a picture says a thousand words comes to mind....
What a great outing and thanks for sharing!!!
Man !! Thats some beautiful country Nice fish too.I'm hungry now   Paul
Great stuff! Unfortunately I won't be taking any overnight trips in the park this year... too many other things I haven't done yet.  Those planked fish look DELISH!
Great collection of pictures to a fantastic trip.  Well done.  Sweetness on the grill ... mmmm.  Thanks for sharing the fun
Hey right on! Very glad to see that your trip went well.
You're making me hungry with a couple of those shots.  Very Cool.
Nice photo's and looks like a great trip! Thanks for sharing it with us!
Now that you made me hungry, both stomach and trip. Thanks for sharing
Great Report! I intend on doing a similar trip this year as well. I hope it will turn out as good as yours.
Very cool ! Looks like good times for everyone.
Great report! Thanks for sharing. Looks like an awesome adventure!
Thanks, That it did! How did you make out?
Wasn't able to go, we had to cancel.
